name: Gothic Rock
description: Combines drama and a dark atmosphere with effects-laden guitars, prominent basslines, propulsive drums, and occasional keyboards and drum machines.

children.name: Deathrock
children.description: More Punk-oriented offshoot of Gothic Rock that emphasizes energy and an effect-laden sound over pure atmosphere.

children.name: Deathrock
children.description: More Punk-oriented offshoot of Gothic Rock that emphasizes energy and an effect-laden sound over pure atmosphere.

children.name: Positive Punk
children.description: Early goth scene in London that grew out of the Anarcho-Punk movement and promoted themes of virtue and mysticism; commonly features wailing vocals, screeching guitars, prominent basslines, and eclectic drum patterns.
